import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { City } from 'src/models/city'; import { GetAccomodationsService } from 'src/app/services/get-accomodations.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { villes$: Observable> constructor(private service: GetAccomodationsService ){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.villes$ = this.service.getCitiesByName('Nan') } }
